00010 /* Purpose: Provides routines to ntegrates a set of pattern  */
00011 /*   and join tests associated with a rule into the pattern  */
00012 /*   and join networks. The joins are integrated into the    */
00013 /*   join network by routines in this module. The pattern    */
00014 /*   is integrated by calling the external routine           */
00015 /*   associated with the pattern parser that originally      */
00016 /*   parsed the pattern.                                     */
